title: European wasp
creator_credit: Greg Taylor Productions and Museum Victoria
brief_description: A well made slide-tape program transferred to video which looks at the European wasp in Australia. Addresses the introduction of the wasps in Australia, the life pattern, nesting habitat, danger of the bite, first aid treatment and eradication methods.
